titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require the Internal Revenue Service to pay interest on late refunds of certain required payments made by entities electing not to have a required taxable year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Internal Revenue Service to pay interest on late refunds of required payments by partnerships or S corporations electing not to have a required taxable year.
